gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `ReservesAndFunds` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `ReservesAndFunds` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `ReservesAndFundsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFundsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ReservesAndFundsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ReservesAndFundsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `DesignatedFundsMember` SHOULD be equal to `DesignatedFunds` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and DesignatedFundsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `DesignatedReservesMember` SHOULD be equal to `DesignatedReserves` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and DesignatedReservesMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `FundsMember` SHOULD be equal to `Funds` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and FundsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `ReservesAndFundsMember` SHOULD be equal to `ReservesAndFunds` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and ReservesAndFundsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `ReservesMember` SHOULD be equal to `Reserves` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and ReservesMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` reported with `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and `ReservesOtherMember` SHOULD be equal to `ReservesOther` without `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` and ReservesOtherMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit9_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
